TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. You are now procrastinating over there.

 

I wish that all my DREAMS (not NIGHTMARES) would become reality.

EDIT: New page!

Edited October 20, 2016 by TopHeavy11

Granted. You nevermore wake up.

I wish all KSP planets had inner geological structure.

34 minutes ago, kerbiloid said:

Granted. You nevermore wake up.

I wish all KSP planets had inner geological structure.

Granted, but that feature is a update that brakes careers and all mods permanently 

 

I wish for  MOAR cats

Granted. They clog up your engines, so no space for you.

 

I wish people would stop making irrational wishes.

Granted, they make irrational numbers now. They divide your annual wages by Pi.

 

I wish System Shock 3 would become a reality.

Granted the systems of the next 3 computers you own will shock and short all there systems

 

I wish stock Ksp had more engines

Granted, you get ten billion different engines to wait for in the loading screen.

I wish for a cubic meter of carbon dioxide ice.

You become an ice-cream street vendor. The first one in Antarctica.

I wish for a next season of Killjoys.

Granted, but someone talks over it and it's not fun anymore.

I wish for a tabletop laser.

Granted. It amplifies your tabletop into a solid beam of wood that spears through the nearest aircraft. Unsurprisingly you get arrested for it.

I wish Children of a Dead Earth had more engines.

Children of a Dead Earth is now Engine Simulator 2016.

I wish for a way to move pictures from my phone to my computer that actually works every time.

They gift you water colors and brush.

I wish to remember any picture I've ever seen.

Granted, you only remember photos, no language, skill, or person.

I wish my roommate wasn't so loud

Granted, he or she is not loud, but louder

I wish i had a small loan of a million dollars.

Granted. You are now required to run for president of the United States in 2016.

I wish for coffee.

Granted.

It's the strongest, darkest, bitterest, any grittiest cup you've ever had.

I wish for ten ten-ton transcontinental tractor-trailers travelling from Tucson to Texas on Tuesday the twenty-third, two thousand two on terribly torn tires.

Granted. They killed your puppy.

What, you don't remember it? Your parents must never have told you the truth.

I wish for a 12-inch pianist.

Your genie misheard "pianist", but he also dropped a decimal somewhere...

I wish I could convert been ASCII and binary in my head.

Granted. Now your brain is powered with DOS.
You think in ASCII texts
You watch CGA-resolution world (as you couldn't find VGA driver for your eyes),
Your memory is limited with 640k (as both himem.sys and QEMM get hanged with your hardware).
You can think only one thought at once. Others are waiting in background as "resident thoughts".

I wish there were no unicodes except of UTF-8. Because Qt uses UTF-8, and I'm lazy to read about other ones.

Granted, there are no more unicorns.

I wish for a nice hot cup of tea

Granted. It's on the other side of the world. But legally, it's yours.

I wish for peace.
granted, but is upheld by a totalitarian regime.  i wish for a p90.

Granted. You get 90th isotope of phosphorus, and a picosecond later it decays spreading around protons and alphas.

I wish 90th isotope of phosphorus were stable.

Granted, but Carbon-6 is now extremely unstable.

I wish for a peck of pickled peppers picked by Peter Piper.

granted, but peter piper put arsenic in the peck of pickled peppers.

i wish for an fn herstal p90
